generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, extending into the distance under an overpass.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the motorbike and fence.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background, including a large multi-story building on the right and smaller commercial buildings under the overpass.
- fence: A metal fence is visible on the right side of the road, running parallel to the sidewalk.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible above the road, hanging from poles.
- traffic sign: A triangular yield sign is visible on a pole near the center of the image.
- vegetation: Trees with green and some brown leaves are visible along the road and under the overpass.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible along the sides of the road and under the overpass.
- sky: A small portion of the sky is visible above the overpass, appearing overcast.
- person: A person wearing a red jacket is visible on the left side of the road, standing next to a bicycle.
- rider: A rider wearing a helmet and black jacket is visible on a motorcycle on the right side of the road.
- car: A white car is visible driving away from the camera on the right side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible on the right side of the road, with the rider on it.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the left side of the road, next to the person in the red jacket.
